content.text: Write the number three hundred thousand and three in figures
the nearest thousand
the nearest ten

Work out how long the cyclist takes to travel a distance of 5.27 kilometres
Give your answer in minutes and seconds
The cyclist increases speed from \(8.5 \text{m/s}\) to \(10.2 \text{m/s}\)
Work out the percentage increase in speed
A cyclist travels at a constant speed of 8.5 metres per second
Complete the table and the bar chart
Write down the mode
Mika counts the number of letters in each of the 61 words in a paragraph
Some of his results are shown in the table and bar chart
Work out the mean
She picks one of these words at random
Find the probability that it has more than three letters
Grace also counts the number of letters in each word of another paragraph
Her results are shown in the table
Find the median
Find the range
She counts the number of letters in each word in the next sentence
These are her results
On the grid, draw a conversion graph between Australian dollars and South African rands
A watch costs 1350 South African rands
Find the cost of this watch in Australian dollars
.........Australian dollars
A plane leaves Sydney at 21 48 local time to fly to Johannesburg
The flight takes 14 hours 15 minutes
The local time in Sydney is 8 hours ahead of the local time in Johannesburg
Find the local time in Johannesburg when the plane arrives
On the plane there are 315 people
The ratio of children : adults = 7 : 8
Work out the number of adults on the plane
Another plane has 420 seats
90% of the seats are occupied
Work out the number of seats that are occupied
Plot these two results on the scatter diagram
What type of correlation is shown in the scatter diagram?

On the scatter diagram, put a ring around the point for this plant
On the scatter diagram, draw a line of best fit
Another plant is given 65 ml of water
Use your line of best fit to estimate the height of this plant
Find the percentage of these 17 plants that have a height of more than \(24\mathrm{cm}\)
Give your answer correct to 1 decimal place
Fidel gives different amounts of water to some plants
The scatter diagram shows the height (cm) and the amount of water (ml) for each of 15 plants

This shape is made from six of these rectangles
Find the area and perimeter of this shape

Describe fully the **single** transformation that maps

The diagram shows three triangles \(A, B\) and \(C,\) on a grid

Write down the coordinates of the point where the two lines intersect

Write down the equation of the line of symmetry of the graph
Use your graph to solve the equation \(x^{2} + x - 8 = 0.\)

Multiply out
Solve

Entry for 3 adults and 5 children costs \(23.50\)
